Thank you for downloading TubeCreator!

------------------------------------------------------------
Quick Start
------------------------------------------------------------
1. Import TubeCreator package.

2. Select TubeCreator from the top menu bar.
   GameObject > Create Other > TubeCreator.

3. Select the shape from the "Preset Shape" list.

4. When you adjust a parameter, it is reflected.

5. Click the "Create" button to create the GameObject.
   The mesh data is saved.

------------------------------------------------------------
Reference
------------------------------------------------------------
 1.  Preset Shape
     This is prepared shapes.

 2.  Surface
     Specify surfaces which is created.

 3.  Division

 3.1.Height
     Division number of surface in the height direction.

 3.2.Side
     Division number of surface in the circumferential direction.

 4.  Basic Size

 4.1.Height
     Basic height size.

 4.2.Radius
     Basic radius size.

 4.3.Thickness (%)
     Ratio of thickness to basic radius.

 4.4.Angle
     Angle of circumference.

 5.  Side Shape

 5.1.Curve
     Side shape by AnimationCurve.
     The value is basic radius ratio.

 5.2.Reverse
     Toggle of reverse.

 5.3.Mirror
     Toggle of mirror.

 6.  Bend

 6.1.Angle
     Specify bend angle.

 6.2.Direction
     Specify bend direction.

 7.  Shift

 7.1.Magnitude (%)
     Ratio of shift magnitude to basic radius.

 7.2.Direction
     Specify shift direction.

 8.  Setting

 8.1.Step Angle
     Specify step angle which is used slider bars.

 8.2.Step %
     Specify step percent which is used slider bars.
 
 8.3.Save Folder
     Mesh data is saved in this folder.

 9.  Select Button
     Click this button to select the editting object.

10.  Create Button
     Click this button to create the GameObject named "Tube_*****".
     (***** is number)
     The mesh data is saved as "Tube_*****.asset".
